Docs.summary: The GameController namespace provides support for external game controllers.

remarks.para: The Game Controller namespace was added in iOS 7 and adds support for game controllers.
Game controllers come in two forms: "form-fitting" controllers that contain an iOS device and "extended wireless" controllers that wirelessly connect to an iOS device or a Mac.
Game controllers must be optional components: game developers must make their game playable by users who do not have game controllers.

Form-fitting controllers are automatically discovered by the system. Extended wireless controllers are discovered by the system subsequent to the application developer calling and will cause the notification handler to fire. When wireless controller disconnect, the notification fires.
